details.name: Messenger
details.text: Sir! I'm bearing important frontline report.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: What is the situation? Have we taken the outpost?

details.name: Messenger
details.text: We did, Sir! Second battalion caught them by surprise, they seemed unprepared.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: A swift victory then.

details.name: Messenger
details.text: Not quite... Amber Noon soldiers put up a real fight, we have lost more units than anticipated. Our scouts have seen Prince Tybalt evacuating from the base not long after our initial strike.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Prince Tybalt running away with his tail between his legs? Not surprising. It would explain why they fought so ferociously. Are our forces ready for another push?

details.name: Messenger
details.text: I'm afraid not. They have a lot of wounded soldiers and damaged equipment, which slows them down significantly. Second battalion will not be able to assist for a couple of days.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Bah! I'll reprimend their commander once we join forces. You are dismissed.

details.name: Messenger
details.text: Yes, Sir!

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Without second battalion this attack might be difficult.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: I only have few units here. It will have to do.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: There are some old Infantry barracks here, I could use them.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: I have to capture that outpost to secure this mountain passage into Amber Noon lands.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: There is a Tank guarding it though. These are very effective against Infantry, I have to be careful. It does not look like they can deploy more of them though. If I take it out, my mission will be much easier.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Luckily, I do have a couple aces up my sleeve.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: That Infantry unit can now use their Heavy Weapon ability, which should make a quick job of that Tank. It does require that unit to get close, and has a long cooldown, so I have to be careful. Leveling up other Infantry units is a good idea.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: In order to make sure my Infantry units survive combat with that Tank, I can use my active ability - Hardened Armour. When used, it increases the armour of all units standing 2 tiles away from me, or closer. In order to use it, I have to cast it on myself.
Capture the Amber Noon HQ.
Noble Sidney must survive.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: No! How could I fail?

details.name: Infantry
details.text: Enemy command has been captured, Sir!

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Finally, I was getting impatient.
I see you were not wasting any time, Sidney.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Lord's lapdog himself showed up. I'm busy, Archibald.

details.name: Gentleman Archibald
details.text: Not anymore. Lord Dawson sent me to bring new orders to you, personally. Amber Noon attack concerns him, but he wants to get in touch with King Ludwig first, to explain matters. You will take your forces and retreat to Ruby Dusk lands at once.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: And let them get away with an attack against us? Just like that?

details.name: Gentleman Archibald
details.text: Lord's orders.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: As my Lord wishes.

details.name: Gentleman Archibald
details.text: Splendid. I'll return to Rubyport to attend other matters.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Lord Dawson is getting soft. Our lands are being attacked and all he can do is sit and wait.

details.name: Noble Sidney
details.text: Ruby Dusk deserves better. Amber Noon will pay for their boldness, and when I return, other nobles will surely see which one of us would be a better ruler.
